name: Hell Hotel (RickiManda, Atrwae, Kubstoff)
description:
Welcome to h͕͓͔͇́ḛ̵͉̺͡l̷̡̫̼̣̥̮l̯̩̲̟̞̥͚̥ Hotel!  The best hotel in this part of n͏͞o̸͠w̶͘h͏̷͏e̴̴͢r̴͟͠͝e҉̴̶̷͟    the country! As our guest, you can d͜ie̛͞   enjoy the best of our services, including:  Modern, comfortable rooms   T͟h̛é̷ g͜h҉̸o̶s̕͞t̨͟s ͜w͘a̷nt̢͡ t͠o̵ ̴k̡͟ì̡̕l̢ĺ ̀̀ỳ̀ò͟u͠͏   An art gallery with dozens of paintings    E̛̕ve͏r͢y ̛s͜é͝ć́o̧̧n͏̶̕d̷̕,̴͠ ̀͞ţ͟h͜e̸͞y̨ ͟gét͏̷͘ st̸͢r͡͏ǫnģ̡̀è́r̨̧͘   We hope you have an excellent stay!    K͏i̶l̶͜͝l̸ ̧t͝ḩ͠e҉m̢͞ ̶b̵̡҉è͜͟f͜ò͝r͠é̸̛ t̶͜h͞͏̡è̛͡y̴̨ ̸͘k̶i̸̷͡l͠l͟͟ ̛͏y͡o͠ų̛̀͜͡ ҉͟͢ y̸o͝͏u̡͠ ̷͢m̛ų͟͠s̢͡t ̵͠e̢͘s͏̨c̢a̡͘͟p̀ȩ͢ ́́t̷̡h̨̛͟i͏͟s̴ ̧̨͠h̨el̴̀l This game was made by:

Kubstoff - management / design / level design

RickiManda- programming

Atrwae - programming / design

lejtekole - programming

Jukky - graphics / design

Eerie - graphics

Doma - level design / sound & music

We're all part of Koło Naukowe Twórców Gier Polygon.
